bill_title: provide for the impoundment and forfeiture of motor vehicles in connection with the arrest of persons who have committed certain offenses.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the impoundment and forfeiture of motor vehicles in connection with the arrest of persons who have committed certain offenses. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Any motor vehicle, as defined in § 32-14-1, that is operated by or under the control of any person who is arrested while operating or in control of the motor vehicle shall be impounded if any two of the following are true: (1) The person has been convicted of driving or being in control of a vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or a drug in violation of § 32-23-1 or a similar statute from another state; (2) The person has no valid driver license in violation of § 32-12-22; (3) The person is unable to provide proof of financial responsibility required pursuant to § § 32-35-113 and 32-35-114. If the person is convicted of the offense for which the arrest was made or convicted of another offense in connection with the arrest, including any offense specified in this section, the impounded motor vehicle shall be forfeited to the state in a manner consistent with § § 34-20B- 85 to 34-20B-88, inclusive.
